mapper.insert: insert into t_sms_seq (id, phone, template_code, status, res_code, res_msg, send_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_sms_seq set phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, template_code = #{templateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, res_code = #{resCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, res_msg = #{resMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, phone, template_code, status, res_code, res_msg, send_time from t_sms_seq
